OOC: Menasor is 45 feet tall, how tall is Condor, and what kind of body
shape does he (she?).
BIC:

Menasor lifts up condor trying to hold his, arms captive, he uses his other
hand to grab the legs that might be free. "Astroblast, Now what Menasor
do?" he said, with a vacant expression on his face.
